prompt:
What’s required to get started?

Ans:
completion: All you need are some sample product images. Professional shots are not required. These can be simple photos taken with your phone or provided by customers. Just upload them along with some text describing what you’d like to see, and we’ll take care of the rest! END

prompt:
Do you provide image editing services?

Ans:
completion: Editing tools are included in our platform, but if you require additional editing services, feel free to reach out to us at hello@booth.ai. END

prompt:
Are Booth AI images delivered ready for use?

Ans:
completion: Yes! We provide high-resolution (4k) images that are ready for use on your website or in marketing materials. END

prompt:
What personal information do we process?

Ans:
completion: When you visit, use, or navigate our Services, we may process personal information depending on how you interact with Booth AI, Inc and the Services, the choices you make, and the products and features you use. END

prompt:
Do we process any sensitive personal information?

Ans:
completion: We may process sensitive personal information when necessary with your consent or as otherwise permitted by applicable law. END

Generative AI allows you to harness the power of machine learning to bring your creative vision to life. Using existing reference shots, you can create new, original images that are tailored to your brand, vision, and specific application. If you can describe it, Booth AI can bring it to life. Unleash your creativity! END

prompt:
What is Booth and features

Ans:
completion: Quickly generate high quality lifestyle photos by simply specifying your desired shot and uploading some sample product images END
